explains: adj. 不美丽的；不吸引人的；令人反感的

sentences.en: Realizing that this particular audience would find his regional accent unattractive, Larry planned to speak with an accent that would be more acceptable to his audience.
sentences.cn: 拉里意识到这些特定的观众会觉得他的地方口音没有吸引力，计划用一种更容易被观众接受的口音说话。
我感到孤独、长得也不好看。

sentences.en: It's an unattractive building, ugly even.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑毫不美观，甚至可以说难看。
